title: Strengthening Programming Practical Skills: Web-Based Self-Directed Learning Readiness Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners improve their self-directed learning readiness scores by 20% or more compared to baseline through 14 weeks of web-based learning system utilization.
Learners complete three or more projects applying RUM-based measurement methods to track knowledge changes in the science field.
Learners acquire five or more self-directed learning skills—such as goal setting, resource management, and self-assessment—in online learning environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
